name: European Union Business Forum in Ethiopia
headAddress: European Union Business Forum in Ethiopia
membership: European Business Organisation Worldwide Network (EBOWWN) - www.ebowwn.com
goal: The EU Business Forum in Ethiopia aims to facilitate operations for EU companies doing business in Ethiopia through (i) Improving the exchange of information about the Ethiopian business and regulatory environment; (ii) Developing a platform for networking and forging business links between EU companies; and (iii) Facilitating dialogue with the various Ethiopian authorities.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
To provide a platform for European businesses in Ethiopia.
To provide access to local market knowledge for stakeholders in Europe.
To advocate for a better business environment in Ethiopia.
To facilitate the dialogue between the European private sector and the Ethiopian government.
To develop and enhance EU position and image in Ethiopia.
